name: eXceed 3rd: Jade Penetrate Black Package
summary: eXceed 3rd reboots the eXceed storyline, taking it in a new direction. In this installment, Rayne Lindwurm, a descendent of the Dragon Clan, fights her way through a tournament to become one of the 7 Cardinal Lords who rule her world, Pandemonium. Standing in her way are other competitors and their familiars, including her own older sister and heiress to the mighty Dragon Clan, Celestia Lindwurm.
storyline: "eXceed 3rd reboots the eXceed storyline, taking it in a new direction. In this installment, Rayne Lindwurm, a descendent of the Dragon Clan, fights her way through a tournament to become one of the 7 Cardinal Lords who rule her world, Pandemonium."

esrb.synopsis: This is an action game in which players guide flying human-like characters through vertically scrolling levels. As players navigate across the screen, they fire magical projectiles, bombs, and energy blasts at mechanical enemies and larger bosses. The somewhat frenetic combat is accompanied by battle cries and colorful explosions; enemies disappear when defeated. During the course of the game, one female character is depicted in a short skirt that accentuates her buttocks and upper thighs.

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 7 years and over only.
It contains: Non realistic looking violence towards fantasy characters - Non realistic looking violence towards characters which although human are not very detailed
